channel.title: chmod +x singularity.sh - AI & ML, Filmmaking, Hacker

item.title: All That Cyberpunk Dystopian Future that Us Millennials were Waiting For
item.description:
Have you ever wondered what will happen to humans in the first years after the Singularity?


What type of life would the machine allows us to live? Or supplies to us? Which problems would be finally solved? Or created? Would it make sense to work? To develop relationships? To love â€¦
item.dc:creator: Marina von Steinkirch
